sn45.180:1: "Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, uddhambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni. Katamāni pañca? Rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṁ, avijjā – imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni. Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ uddhambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo.
sn45.180:2: Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, uddhambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni. Katamāni pañca? Rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṁ, avijjā – imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni. Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ uddhambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo.
sn45.180:3: Ogho yogo upādānaṁ,ganthaṁ anusayena ca;Kāmaguṇā nīvaraṇaṁ,khandhā oruddhambhāgiyāti.
sn45.180:4: Avijjāvaggo paṭhamo,dutiyaṁ vihāraṁ vuccati;Micchattaṁ tatiyo vaggo,catutthaṁ paṭipanneneva.
sn45.180:5: Titthiyaṁ pañcamo vaggo,chaṭṭho sūriyena ca;Bahukate sattamo vaggo,uppādo aṭṭhamena ca.
sn45.180:6: Divāsavāggo navamo,Dasamo appamādena ca;Ekādasabalavaggo,Dvādasa esanā pāḷiyaṁ;Oghavaggo bhavati terasāti.
